comment: Technical lemma to simplify the statement of ~ ipopos . The empty set is (rather pathologically) a poset under our definitions, since it has an empty base set ( ~ str0 ) and any relation partially orders an empty set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 30-Jan-2015.)
